name: VR Space Defense
description:
In VR Space Defense you must defend your ship from increasingly larger and harder waves of drones.

This is an arcade style shooter which requires you to shoot down the drones with your gun. Drones will spawn in higher numbers and with increasing hit points and damage . Try to prevent them from destroying your spaceship for as long as you can.

(VR Headset and Motion Controllers are Required)

Video of Screenplay:

One of my goals in 2016 was to learn how to make a game. This is the result of a personal 48 hour hackathon :)
